script:
1). Could you do me a favor?
Here, check out this flavor.
Sure. What do you need? 
No, I wouldn't be able to.
2). Why were you talking with Ms. Martin?
I'm updating her on the sales figures.
I needed to ask her about the proofs. 
We are talking about the trip to Paris.
3). What did you do with my pen?
I will write you a letter with it.
I'm looking for my blue folder.
I thought I gave it back to you.
